column2: BRIEF-Century Communities Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.67 May 8 (Reuters) - Century Communities Inc: * CENTURY COMMUNITIES REPORTS RECORD FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE $401.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $382.4 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.52 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * INCREASING EXPECTED HOME DELIVERIES TO BE IN A RANGE OF 4,600 TO 5,100 HOMES FOR FULL YEAR 2018 * HOME SALES REVENUES EXPECTATION TO BE IN A RANGE OF $1.8 BILLION TO $2.1 BILLION FOR 2018 * CONTINUE TO EXPECT ACTIVE SELLING COMMUNITY COUNT TO BE IN RANGE OF 130 TO 140 COMMUNITIES AT END OF FULL YEAR 2018 * QTRLY DELIVERIES GREW 55 PCT TO 941 HOMES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Century Communities Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.75 May 8 (Reuters) - Century Communities Inc: * CENTURY COMMUNITIES REPORTS RECORD FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.52 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE $394.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $382.4 MILLION * INCREASING EXPECTED HOME DELIVERIES TO BE IN A RANGE OF 4,600 TO 5,100 HOMES FOR FULL YEAR 2018 * HOME SALES REVENUES EXPECTATION TO BE IN A RANGE OF $1.8 BILLION TO $2.1 BILLION FOR 2018 * CONTINUE TO EXPECT OUR ACTIVE SELLING COMMUNITY COUNT TO BE IN RANGE OF 130 TO 140 COMMUNITIES AT END OF FULL YEAR 2018 * QTRLY DELIVERIES GREW 55% TO 941 HOMES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
